sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AJAXRotationSynchronizeWorker</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AJAXRotationSynchronizeWorker</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AJAXRotationSynchronizeWorker = Class.create();
AJAXRotationSynchronizeWorker.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	start: function() {
		// Setup background worker
		var worker = new GlideRotationSynchronizeWorker();
		worker.setTableName(this.getParameter("sysparm_ajax_processor_table_name"));
		worker.setProgressName("Executing Synchronize Shards");

		// Start worker in the background
		worker.setBackground(true);
		worker.start();
		
		// Return worker progress ID to caller
		var progressId = worker.getProgressID();
		return progressId;	
	},
	
    type: 'AJAXRotationSynchronizeWorker'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-11-13 17:20:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8989437473312300e41458ef64f6a780</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AJAXRotationSynchronizeWorker</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Database Rotation" source="com.snc.db.rotation">e5adf40b6d2220100acb70b35343304b</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8989437473312300e41458ef64f6a780</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-11-13 17:44:08</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>627</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
